text: unkalukku munnirunta (namatu pala) tutarkalum (ivvaru) poyyarenave kurappattanar. Avarkalukku nam utavi varum varai avarkal poyyarenat tunpuruttappattatai avarkal (urutiyotu) poruttuk kontiruntanar. (Akave, napiye! Nirum avvare poruttiruppiraka.) Allahvutaiya vakkukalai evaralum marra mutiyatu. (Umakku munnirunta nam) tutarkalin (ittakaiya) ceytikal niccayamaka um'mitam vante irukkinrana
